title: Dukes of Hazzard - '01' on the General Lee
content:
Hey all,

I've been trying to identify two (to three) fonts from the old TV series 'The Dukes of Hazzard' (1979; [imbd-link](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013529/http:/www.imdb.com/title/tt0078607/)).

One (or two) would be the lettering on the car, General Lee, especially the **'01'** on the side of the car, as depicted in the attachment. And I was wondering if the font of the letters differs from the font of the ciphers 01 (unfortunately, I could not find any decent images for the letters, just [this one](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013529/http:/i28.photobucket.com/albums/c214/orange01/dukes_of_hazzard.jpg) or [this one](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013529/http:/www.prnewswire.com/mnr/cmt/21313/images/21313a.jpg)).

The other font would be the logo of the series, as depicted [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013529/http:/www2.warnerbros.com/dukesofhazzard/img/splash/DH_Splash_left_p2_off.jpg) or [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013529/http:/images.amazon.com/images/P/B0001WTWXI.01.LZZZZZZZ.jpg).

But I'm guessing that would be a custom made one..

Thanks a lot,  
alex.

author: alex.inacrowd

comments.content:
Noone? Any suggestions where I could find help?  
I already checked identifont & whatthefont without success.. :-(
